summary: Four friends are searching for rented accommodation. The landlady insists only on married couples, so two of the friends are forced to dress as women and pretend to be wives of the other two.
cast: Ashok Saraf|Laxmikant Berde|Siddharth|Ashwini Bhave|Supriya Pilgaonkar|Priya Arun Berde|Nivedita Joshi|Sudhir Joshi|Viju Khote|Nayantara|Madhu Apte|Suhas Bhalekar|Rajan Kavatkar|Gulab Korgaonkar|Jairam Kulkarni|Sachin Pilgaonkar|Avinash Thakur|Lata Thatte|Bipin Varti
keywords: situation comedy|husband wife relationship|marriage|room for rent|restaurant
title: Ashi Hi Banwa Banwi
